net.sourceforge.groboutils.codecoverage.v2.ant.zip
Class ZipShort

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.groboutils.codecoverage.v2.ant.zip.ZipShort
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public final class ZipShort
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Utility class that represents a two byte integer with conversion rules for the big endian byte order of ZIP files.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Stefan Bodewig
